text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Yet trump gassed the #blm protesters 
Trumps hasn't denounced the cops for killing Mr. Floyd 
Trump doesn't have a plan on police reform.
Its been 10 days/ like covid19, actions speak louder than words.
